_header: Lo King Arthur full manly and full wise
_description: King Arthur, Charlemagne, and David — three quatrains

BodTan407.First Lines:
Lo kyng Artour ful manly and ful wyseWhan he slow guruard &
                    alle his cheff ches…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…And afterward whan golyas was styntyd of stryffI made the
                    Sawter my mercy to full fyll
